what: Working with Matrices over Finite Prime Fields
title: Working with Matrices over Finite Prime Fields
text: goal matrixmodp make two matrix algebra tasks easier working fields ùîΩp. Specifically, package provides two functions: rref_p() calculates reduced-row echelon form matrix, inv_p() calculates inverse (square, invertible) matrix.

title: Working with Matrices over Finite Prime Fields
text: can install public released version matrixmodp CRAN : can install development version matrixmodp GitHub :
code: install.packages("matrixmodp") #> Installing package into 'C:/Users/rhigginbottom/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmpc35hmI/temp_libpath93c0442736d5' #> (as 'lib' is unspecified) #> Warning: package 'matrixmodp' is not available for this version of R #>  #> A version of this package for your version of R might be available elsewhere, #> see the ideas at #> https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-patched/R-admin.html#Installing-packages # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("rhigginbottom/matrixmodp")

title: Working with Matrices over Finite Prime Fields
text: first provide example finding RREF matrix entries ùîΩ5. now show find inverse 3‚ÄÖ√ó‚ÄÖ3 matrix ùîΩ7.

title: Working with Matrices over Finite Prime Fields
text: code rref_p() function taken echelon() function matlib package. different way row operations need work using entries ùîΩp, functions copied entirely. makes attribution somewhat difficult. license chosen package specifically chosen compatible license use matlib package overlap code.

what: Calculate the inverse of a matrix mod p ‚Äî inv_p
title: Calculate the inverse of a matrix mod p ‚Äî inv_p
text: inv_p() finds inverse square matrix field \(F_p\). function checks invertibility row-reduces augmented matrix \([|]\) \(F_p\) find inverse.
